title: Soraka is weak now
body: I think Soraka isn't as strong as she used to be and not as fun to play as; I like playing with skins for my champions and the only good skin for Soraka is Celestine Soraka. Also, her E is slowly becoming worse and worse for me and Riot is slowly removing silencing from the game. I think some people will agree with me. I just hope a Riot employee reads this so Soraka can go back to being as good as she was before.

replies.body: make her passive an aa bleed
I'm pretty sure Soraka is getting worse and worse and causes lag for me. Especially her Ult. It could just be my computer thart's packing up because I've had it for like six years.
She was very broken before. She's only just under-powered ATM.
